Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description:
This review is for the 

De'Longhi ECAM44.660.B Eletta Bean to Cup Coffee Machine, 1450 W - Black

Benefits of this machine- very easy to use and saves a lot of time with one touch for most popular drinks- ability to customise drinks to suit your taste- automatic frother works very well and has several settings for the different drinks- felt uneasy using pods environmentally and this machine grinds beans fresh- we use the milk from this machine to make hot chocolate for our toddler as we feel safe it will not be too hot for her- we do use this to make tea.  Saves boiling the kettle and you can have hot milk too- love seeing the different layers of the drink through the coffee mugPoints to note- check the dimensions- we have not yet had the joy of performing maintenance on this.  But these machines will require regular filters, decalc and cleaning- grinders are never going to be silentTips- Lavazza coffee beans can be had relatively cheaper from Costco if you are a member- Branded coffee cups can be very expensive.  We have found the IKEA 365+ clear mugs a very suitable alternative.  They do 2 sizes and we have found the smaller ones are a good size for the Cappucino and the larger ones for Lattes and the flat white coffees.- Using a small tub under the "taps" when running a clean on the milk caraffe and when powering off the machine, means the drip tray has to be pulled out much less frequently- Placing your coffee cup under the machine when it's turned on means it can get hot with the rinse.- We always run a clean on the caraffe if it's come fresh out of the fridge just to help pre-warm it- I have attached an image we have printed and laminated showing the different drinks that can be made.  This is much easier to show to guests when they are deciding which drink they would like.- The image also includes the different froth settings for the different drinks so will save you having to pull out the manualWe are relatively newbies to the world of coffee coming from a cultural background of tea drinkers. However we had recently been frequenting more and more Costa and then used the Aeropress with a separate frother at home.  We have now moved onto this splendid device and now on average I will have at least 2 coffees a day from this machine (Cappucino in the morning and Flat White later in the day) and then the family have adhoc lattes throughout the day.As always, if you find this review helpful please make sure to let me know.  Knowing you've found it helpful motivates me to do more such reviews.

   This is the second De'Longhi machine I have owned.  I bought my first which was the DeLonghi 5600 Perfecta over 5 years ago and it still makes a great tasting coffee, however the temperature of the water wasn't as hot as when new so when I saw this new ,machine on offer from amazon I just had to get it.  My first machine has found a new home by the way and is still making great coffee.  When I passed it on it had produced nearly 6000 cups of coffee.This machine is stunning to look at, I just love the black which compliments my kitchen and other appliances.  My old machine was great but this one is a huge step up in terms of performance.  It holds more water, it is quieter, it heats up quickly and holds nearly twice the amount of beans. It also has a replaceable filter so great for hard water areas and the splash tray and coffee grind container are massive compared to the old one which means less emptying.  The milk carafe has also been redesigned going from a round container to a slimmer rectangular shape making it much easier to store in the fridge.  Setting up is so easy, even if you have never used one before as the instructions are clear and easy to follow.  Of course the quality of coffee produced is entirely based on the quality of beans used and it's worth shopping around as there are some wonderful beans about at very low prices.Cleaning is very easy, it comes with all the tools you need and a free bottle of descaler.  If this machine lasts as long as its predecessor then I will be very happy.  An excellent coffee machine and I'm in coffee heaven.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: We've had this machine for almost a month. It's fantastic and light years ahead of the Tassimo pod machine it replaced. It looks good too.It produces beautiful freshly ground coffee to our specific taste. As good as any coffee shop you can visit and for around 10p a cup (or 15p a cup if you like your coffee milky). We've based this on buying excellent Taylor of Harrogate beans on a 2 for 1 deal. This cost would obviously rise proportionately if you bought from an artisan producer.Moreover, it produces a perfect cup of coffee quickly, effortlessly and in a simple, foolproof way.Cleaning is mostly automatic, self generated and a doddle.My wife and I like our coffee the same, so we now use the 2 cup function which dispenses 2 espressos simultaneously to exact requirements. Then we manually add the exact amount of frothed milk we prefer using the milk frother or carafe as DeLonghi call it.The coffee output is very warm as opposed to hot, so occasionally we have resorted to a quick heat up in the microwave when we have wanted our coffee to stay hotter for longer for those occasions recently when we decided to sit outside.Don't hesitate. Buy one now.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Love this coffee machine! It's not perfect, I have a few niggles with it but overall it makes lovely cappuccino and americano, my go to coffees. Get's used at least 3 times a day.It has settings for other milk based coffees but no where does it tell you what the machine does differently. I know what the difference between a cappuccino and a flat white is but i'd like to know what the machine does that's different. as far as I can tell. they are all the same...a shot of coffee...and some milk at varying amounts which you manually set to what ever frothiness you want.Makes a fairly hot cappuccino, think the milk could do with being a degree or to warmer but a long as you drink it immediately its good. I tend to stick mine in the microwave for 15seconds as i like my coffee hot. Temp for a plain coffee is fine.The milk frother works well at it's different settings. After you've made a coffee with it, it will recommend you turn the dial to clean on the forther. At this point I'd recommend you have a spare cup handy to put under it because it sprays milky water all over the place, making quite the mess. This part just doesn't seem thought out at all and is my one main annoyance with this coffee machine. Your try and surrounding worktop will be disgusting after a day of use if you didn't clean up as you go.I still love it even with these gripes. I got it at a reduced price but if I had paid full price I'd be a bit disappointed.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Just to provide some insight to people like myself when I was doing my own research. First of all think about which coffee drinker type are you and what you value the most.A) you really need convinience and want a decent coffee fast - this would be mostly a nespresso drinker. And if you were worried about capsule waste or just the high cost per capsule now averaging 40 cents there is another option which is a reusable capsule. You need to check which ones would work for your machine.B) If you would like to drink coffee from fresh beans and your main drink type is coffee with milk (latte, capuccino, etc) then a bean to cup is definitely for you. This machine is a really good bean to cup. Its pretty easy to use (not as easy as a nespresso one) and gives you good coffee. To get a good coffee will be trial and error until you get the right grind for your beans. We are still trying to learn. With lavazza beans we are around 15 cents per capsule excluding the cost of the milk, so much lower than what we were spending in capsules. Also as some reviews here said, this machine uses a lot of water, when turning on and off but if this is to ensure the inside mechanism is clean I dont see any harm on it. You can save the water and water the plants.C) Coffee for you is a hobby and you like to enjoy the full experience from the perfect grind to the pressure, quantity etc then something like a sage oracle would be perfect. It does require more work and more maintenance. But probably thats part of the experience too.Myself: we drink around 3 coffees in the morning between me and husband. I drink decaff affer lunch. We both have a nespresso for the last 13 years and we were mainly drinking espresso. For us coffee means short ristretto size full of cream and body. In the morning I do like my capuccino. Whereas I love coffee since I can remember the reality is I dont have a lot of time to learn all the settings and clean the machine to keep it spot on. With this in mind Ill summarize belowPros:1) really easy to use (but worth reading the instructions to setup). Once youve adjusted your settings it will be pretty easy to use on a daily basis. Would recommend a dirty coffee mug when turning on and off the machine.2) For those that drink decaf you can use ground coffee for it so you dont have to swap the beans. I normally do a rinsing after I do a decaf to ensure its all clean and ready for the next espresso.3) You can do milk based drinks at the touch of a finger. Im still using my aeroccino as I can make the capuccino foam for a single drink without leaving anything in the container and its easier to clean I find.4) You get the chance to use fresh beans and find the coffee that suits your taste buds.5) The grind settings for this type of machine are not bad at all. We are still trying to learn the best combo between coffee strenght and grind.6) pretty straightforward to clean so far and would definitely recommend a water filter to avoid a lot of descaling. I have the delonghi filters but thinking of trying the charcoal stick which I use on my water bottle to see if the machine would cope with it just to avoid plastic waste.Cons:1) The body / cream levels are more 'watery' than a nespresso. To reach this conclusion weve used the same beans on the nespresso (reusable capsule) by using the manual grinder and the eletta and even though they both look really creame the body of the nespresso was better. Theres something quite powerful of using the capsule and all that pressure inside. If only there was a machine that had a really good and compatible reusable capsule it would be fab.2) coffee waste - here nothing wrong with the eletta as such as all of the non capsule machines suffer from the same sin. The amount of coffee needed for an espresso is almost 3 times higher than the nespresso even though its a lot cheaper than if you buy the capsules. I just wish this machines could be more efficient with coffee usage. Maybe one day.3) Lack of cup warmer - it looks like its there but does nothing. The model above comes with the menu setting which allows to turn this feature on and off. Some people complain about coffee temperature so this would help. What I use instead is the water from turning on the machine and throw it away before taking my coffee. You can also warm your cup in the microwave.Ill be honest here, if there were really good reusable capsules out there I would have kept the nespresso longer as the espresso has more body. But overall for the coffee user I'm happy (my husband is not as he drinks more espresso than me).So hope this review is helpful to you.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Everything about this machine is amazing bar a couple of things which I've not been able to rectify myself - these may be user error but I don't think so. Dont let the below stop you from buying, it is a top quality machine.Firstly, the bean container doesn't tell when it needs to be refilled, but will still attempt to make a coffee even if empty or almost empty. Its not the end of the world but means you have to throw out a coffee once in 50 maybe.Secondly, the drip tray being full doesn't trigger a notification to empty the drip tray - I've had this a few months now and it has never told me when to empty - more often than not it ends up overflowing and moving it to the sink while full inevitably leads to water all over the floor. The fix is just to empty it more frequently but its not something I think about and I feel a machine of this caliber should give fair warning. Everything else about this machine is perfect, it makes a flawless cup every single time - needs to be descaled about once per month, and filter change (hard water area) about once every 2 months.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Despite all the rave reviews heaped upon this machine we were very disappointed to the extent we returned it for a refund. It is an attractive machine, it does froth milk very well and we liked the ability to remove the milk carafe and pop it in the fridge. But the actual drinks it makes (and that's what you buy it for) are very poor. Yes, it does have the capability to adjust various settings - strength of coffee, grind of coffee to suit your taste, which we did - but you would still expect that if you pressed the 'Capuccino' button you would get something resembling, well, a cappucino. You don't. No barista in the world makes a capuccino by pouring the frothed milk first into the cup followed by the coffee but that's what this machine does. Result?: the coffee drops through the milk and sits at the bottom of the cup. No blending of the two takes place and you end up drinking a black coffee through a cap of frothed milk. The same process for any of the milk-type drinks. They were all very, very disappointing.And the returns process has been tortuous. It was returned to Amazon nearly 4 weeks ago. I have had to chase the courier and Amazon to find out where the parcel was (because tracking sent it to a 'black hole') eventually discovering that Amazon had it but I have yet to see the refund to my account.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Il gruppo infusore di questa macchina De'Longhi ECAM44.660.B Eletta Cappuccino è meccanicamente ben disegnato, sicuramente migliore di quella che avevo prima (principale concorrente de longhi di cui non faccio il nome) si sporca molto meno anche in virtu' del fatto che non  prevede nella manutenzione mensile  l'ingrassaggio delle sue parti mobili per cui i pochi residui di caffe si rimuovono facilmente.Il contenitore dei chicchi è più capiente (400 grammi al posto di 250) e NON RIMANGONO BLOCCATI SENZA RIUSCIRE A CADERE NEL MACININO COME SUCCEDEVA SEMPRE PRIMA e anche il contenitore dell'acqua ha capacità superiore (2litri) tutto questo con dimensioni praticamente invariate rispetto all'altra. Il display alfanumerico su 2 righe fornisce le stesse informazioni indicate su display a cristalli liquidi della macchine più moderne che magari mostrano anche inutili immagini o consentono di fare il caffè utilizzando l'app sul telefono. Se ritenete utili queste funzioni siete liberi di spendere 3-400 euro in più, alla fine il risultato sarà il medesimo.Anche dal punto di visto estetico con 2-300 euro potete avere la parte frontale della vostra macchina rivestita con un sottile ma bellissimo strato di acciaio spazzolato del valore di qualche euro o giù di li. FA 2 CAFFE IN UN COLPO SOLO TRITANDO IL DOPPIO DELLA QUANTITA DI CHICCHI E HA 2 CALDAIE SEPARATE PER IL CIRCUITO DELL'ACQUA E DEL VAPORE PER FARE LA SCHIUMA CON IL LATTE  più corposa e persistente al confronto...Un consiglio...erogate acqua calda nelle tazzine con l'acqua calda prima se amate il caffè bello caldo...ci vogliono pochi secondi. D'altronde tutte le macchine automatiche che ho posseduto finora non lo fanno abbastanza caldo, specialmente se arrivate dalla moka...Ha un valore di mercato di 6-700 euro ma visto che parliamo di un modello del 2016, sono riuscito ad averla a 450 in virtù di un'offerta.A mio parere il miglior compromesso qualità-prezzo esistente sul mercato.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I've been using this machine for over a week now and am slowly realising how versatile it is and how good the coffee can be. First of all, this is a BIG machine. Maybe it's me, but I was not expecting it to be so big, although it has to be in order to do everything it does. It's not a problem, but do realise you need more room for this than a kettle or 'normal' coffee machine. People who complain about the temperature of the coffee or consistency of the froth probably have not read the manual carefully and have not changed the default settings. Almost everything can be changed and set to your liking: coffee strength, temperature, amount etc., so if you read the manual and take time to learn what this machine can do, you'll end up with a damn good cup of coffee every time. I've been looking for a good coffee machine for years and was willing to pay for it when I found it, and this machine fits the bill perfectly.  (I admit it's not cheap, but if you were looking for cheap you wouldn't have spent more than a few seconds looking at this!)Oh, just remembered: when you're putting in or taking out the milk frother container, be careful not to accidentally switch the machine on or off, as it goes through a rinse cycle every time on switching on and the on/off switch is on the top left where you put your hand to steady it.New edit after using the machine for a while: Still love it, and have learned to heat cup first with boiling water for people who like their coffee hotter (even with the machine set to hottest level). I make a cappuccino with the cappuccino button, then top the cup up with frothed milk to make it exactly the way I like it. I use beans roasted to a 4, and set the level to strong.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I have been very impressed with this coffee machine because I hadn't realised how easy it is to operate. Just pop in some beans into the top reservoir, fill up the tank and choose your coffee type. It's very versatile because as well as using the beans, it is possible to use pre-ground coffee by adding it through the little chute on top; we tend to keep the beans reservoir full of decaf and I just use the chute when I want a "normal" coffee.With the beans in the top, you can choose how strong the flavour is (mild through to extra-strong, in 5 stages) and how much liquid is delivered by tapping on the cups icon to get standard, long or extra long. There are so many variables for getting an Americano style coffee that I am still learning about them all, even though we've had the machine for over a month now... and I haven't even looked at the cappuchino options which can be made using the milk accessory!!I have had to do a descaling operation already; partly this was my fault for not checking the water hardness when I set it up, but it looks like this happens about once a month anyway. The De'Longhi descaler worked very well but is fairly expensive (I bought the 500ml replacement as it works out loads cheaper in the long run). I haven't had to replace the filter yet (only gets done once every two months) but again the De'Longhi versions are not cheap (even on Amazon) so I will need to investigate the possibility of using the non-branded versions that pop up as suggestions.All in all, it has been a fantastic acquisition and makes life a lot easier. I'm very pleased with it, especially as I got it in one of the pre-New Year sales and it costs double what I paid for it now.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Don't get me wrong, this machine is great.  The only issue is that a latte is not quite hot enough for me.  But it's easy to pop the mug in the microwave for 20 seconds to get it to the right temp for me.Compared to our previous machine (also a De'Longhi which we'd had for over 5 years) it's so easy to make a lovely coffee as the milk is frothed for you, whereas I used to have to stand at the machine with a metal jug and manually frothing the milk for a couple of minutes.Hoping reliability will be as good as our last De'Longhi which didn't miss a beat whilst we had it.Another slight issue is that the touch sensitive buttons are extremely sensitive, so just a slight brush of the panel whilst inserting the milk container or adjusting the height of the coffee spout can set the machine off doing something.  Press any other button and it stops straight away though.  I'm now used to that so I'm extra careful where I put my hands.....It's a bit complicated to use initially, but once you get the hang of it and programmed the machine for your chosen mug volumes it's a doddle, literally one button press and less than a minute later a lovely latte.In summary it's a 9/10 for me, with the temperature dropping it down from an easy 10/10

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Bought my machine 4.5 years ago. Gets used several times a day for both Espresso and Cappuccino.Taste is great with Lavazza Rossa beans and as good today as it was when I first got it.Cleaning is easy, and only requires descaling every 12months with my water condition.Only part that has needed replacing is the milk carafe straw. Coffee is strong, not bitter (through too much tamping or pressure) and not burned (too hot).Coffee Connoisseurs May find fault with the extraction but for us everyday drinkers it’s great.Short strong pull with no sugar for me

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: The machine was purchased to replace a De Longhi Magnifica which was still working fine. Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I got in a heap of trouble buying this machine because my partner hates coffee !! but it was certainly worth it.The machine looks great and more importantly works great as well. Set up was easy and after trying a few different combinations you soon find your favorite settings and quickly learn to adapt them for your friends preferences. The machine is great at informing you when it needs water or when the grounds box is full etc.You can set the PH setting based on your water hardness and the machine tells you when it needs descaling. The descale process is semi automatic and very easy (you don't have to stand over the machine waiting).There are three different milk settings, hot milk for flat whites, light froth for lattes and a thicker froth for cappuccinos.It delivers one shot or two shots at the touch of a button along with hot water or hot milk and it makes cappuccinos, flat whites, lattes and latte macchiatos automatically.I have had the machine for six months and love it.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I absolutely love this machine. We wanted an automatic bean to cup machine after several years of having a nespresso that was ok, but never really lived up to cafe standard coffee. I did a lot of research and settled on this one as it had good reviews and can be used to make a range of different coffees.The initial set up was easy enough. I changed the temperature straight away and have found all of the coffees to be perfect temperature-wise. I do always warm the cup with some hot water first and we have the double walled thermo glasses so i don’t know if that makes a difference.The machine is so easy to use and the coffee is superb (we are using very expensive coffee beans from a small local producer). With a bit of tweaking strength wise we are enjoying cafe standard cappuccinos, lattes, americanos and flat whites (as others have said not really a true flat white, but a very nice latte type coffee). I’m so pleased that we bought this machine.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I had one of these previously, so know its a great coffee machine. I bought from Amazon Warehouse fully understanding it may well be a returned item, previously used, possibly marked or damaged. The machine has a statistics function, my old machine which was 7 years old had made around 2500 coffees according to the counter, we used it daily. This machine had made 2700 coffees, 1500 milk menu options and had no less than 18 filter changes ( every 3 months would make it 6 years old!!!) The coffee dribbled out. I started the return process on Saturday 29th January, its now the 2 February and no sign of anyone coming to collect it. This is a very disappointing experience from Amazon and will be wary of buying a high value item from them again after this experience.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: The main reason for writing this review is to outline a recurrent issue I’ve had.  I have owned the coffee machine for one week under two years so still under warranty.  It has just today been returned to Delonghi for the third time with an identical fault. What happens each time is that the frother refuses to work after making just one coffee, after that no milk just steam. Delonghi say it’s the main control board which has already been changed twice and looks like it’s going to be changed again.  That’s pretty unsatisfactory.  I can understand one board failing but three suggests there is an inherent design issue.  This isn’t too bad just inconvenient whilst under warranty but will be very annoying if it keeps happening when out of warranty although I’m hopeful delonghi see there’s an issue here and take remedial action.Other than that love the coffee.  I only use decaf Lavazza ground coffee although my daughter uses beens.  Always add the milk separately. Seems to need descaling quite regularly (about every 2 or 3 weeks). Tend to warm my mug up with boiling water and the milk jug. This ensures the hottest coffee possible.If it wasn’t for the technical problems would be straight 5 stars.24 November 2019.  Further to the above review I’m very pleased to report that Delonghi have actually replaced my machine with a brand new machine with a fresh 2 year guarantee. One couldn’t have asked for a better service than that. I have increased the rating to 4 stars from 3, still having to knock off one star because of the problems with machine one.  Hopefully machine two won’t have similar issues.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Very rare I take the time to review a product but I had to make an exception here. I've had a quality bean to cup machine for a few years but had long fancied upgrading to an automatic machine. Whilst it has many great features what matters most is the taste of the coffee and I simply could not get my cappuccino right! I tried every setting in the manual over a period of weeks and in the end gave up. I'm just so pleased I didn't get rid of my original machine. Seriously, I visit Starbucks on a daily basis and many other places and have never seen the milk go in the cup first - but that's what this machine does!!! It's just wrong. I know my coffee and my beans and yet persevered trying various different types. So all I can add is that if you are looking for an automatic bean to cup machine and love cappuccinos then I would strongly suggest you look elsewhere. Save yourself the trouble, what a disappointment.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Bought this for an office of 11 people in June 2018. It's made 6522 coffees since then - a little over a year - which equates to around 25 a day. We've followed the machine's schedule for descaling and replacement filters, and it's never gone even slightly wrong.Doesn't exactly rival a proper espresso machine (coming from someone who used to run a cafe, bear in mind) but better than a french press in a professional setting - a lot less time lost with staff doing the coffee round. And running a plumbed in espresso machine in a small busy office is unrealistic.Highly recommended for a similar use case. Five star rating reflects this; incomparable to higher end machines.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This is my first professional coffee maker and I feel that this was a good choice. However, there is few things which I feel could been improved in this machine.Pros/Features: - Does excellent coffee and fluffs milk well - Burr grinder allows to choose fineness level of your coffee - You can use pre-grounded coffee too, and machine remembers this setting - You can set water temperature - You can crudely customize levels of water and milk in your favourite coffees (more on that later) - You can create your own coffee recipe (only one) - It can give you just coffee/water/milk so you can get rid of your old kettleCons/Useful usage tips: - Grinding adjustment (little dial inside coffee beans container) can be adjusted ONLY when mill is in operation! Meaning, when coffee is about to be grinded, be ready, have a lid open and adjust quickly when mill starts to operate. I feel that this has not been emphasized enough and explained in the manual. Do not force the dial, it won't move when mill is not in use, you may break it! - There is few coffee types available in this machine: Cappuccino (Max. milk froth setting), Macchiatto/Flat White (Min. froth setting) and Caffelatte (No froth). You have to adjust froth level manually before making coffee. Make sure you remember these settings, otherwise you are not making coffee as designed. Manual should have these settings explained in some more prominent place. - You can customize and adjust amounts of water and milk in your favourite coffees by doing "live" example, which machine will remember: Press button for milk to start, when done press again to stop, then water with coffee will go and you press button again to stop water. This is very unreliable and not precise, because it solely relies on your measurement each time. Also, you can't customize coffee beans amount at all, just water and milk. Temperature cannot be set per coffee also, setting is for all coffees. For example, you feel that you want to remove 20ml of milk or add 20ml of water to your favourite coffee? No chance, you have to make a coffee from the scratch and machine will remember what you did again. By doing it again "live", you changing both milk and coffee values and each time you destroy that perfect amount of ingredient you may have achieved previously.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Packaging was fine, arrived on time. Set up was a little fussy and takes a couple of hours to fit everything together, run the first coupld of test batches, etc. The machine appeared to work initially but then there was a jam somewhere within and all we got was hot brown water coming out of the machine as the ground coffee wasn't getting to where it would normally mix with the hot pressurised water to produce coffee. Poor quality control.Sent it back for return but after a month it is still listed as collected but not reached the seller, so I have still not received a refund.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Very pleased with this machine. It is simple to use and makes a really good cup of coffee. Plenty of options for different types, strengths and lengths of coffee.The hot water option makes it ideal for a cup of tea too. The temperature of the coffee is also plenty hot enough, so often a problem with these machines. It really does not take very long to heat up ready to brew.The milk container being easy to detach and store in the fridge makes life so much easier.It is quiet enough, though you can certainly hear it when grinding.If the coffee is not to your liking, you can even customise the milk to coffee ratio, and store it for your convenience.And top it all off, it looks pretty stylish too.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: good but broken after 3 months of average use.....now need to ship it off to get repaired?!? while it was working it was making good coffee after alittle trial and error, a bit of a pain to clean but was ok. hopefully its just a one off and when we receive our fixed unit back (28 days minimum so im told) i'll update when we have it back

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Good frothy drink what I like, programmable option, not good enough for my opinion , send it back, already sent back a melitta barista ts , not hot enough, this is a bit hotter,  Not happy sent this back too, now on order a primadonna soul, customer service reckons it is fully programmable, so ordered one, I do prefer the water tank system, frother , rinsing system better on th delonghi. Frothy weakish coffee, what I like, the machines mentioned probably do a good espresso etc.. not for me. Hope this was helpful.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This was purchased as a replacement for a De’Longhi EC860 ‘pump expresso’ machine.Comparison:Pro’sThis machine is much cleaner and more convenient being a full beans-to-cup modelClear, simple menu for operationAlerts for water level, beans, grounds bin. I used to get concerned at the old machine running a dry pump when water ran outStylish modern clean looksGood coffee when you have set it up for personal tasteCons :It’s large.Compulsory Automatic rinsing at switch on / off is a bit of a pain, unless you want to clean drip tray frequently you need a container under the dispenserIt’s a bit slow from start to finishIt doesn’t make as good coffee as the old machine and uses more of it per cup. I think our usage has risen about 30%.ConclusionI miss the coffee quality of the old machine, but tbh there’s not much in it. The cleanliness and convenience of this machine outweigh any negatives. Just hope it lasts as many cycles as the old one

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Has been a solid machine over the past year, had no troubles. Has handled all bean types great. Don't use the finest grind as can struggle with some bean types, but have experienced no taste consequence. Every program customizable for volume. Would say machine is designed more for smaller coffess rather than larger (can't adjust how much coffee is ground only amount of water used), but can use 'double coffee' portions if you want larger coffees. Requires fairly regular cleaning of the milk container to avoid milk turning bad, but this is to be expected. Use britta filtered water in it in a very hard water area and no issues as of yet, with periodic decalcification.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I’m glad I spent a bit more than originally planned when looking for a Bean to Cup.I read reviews saying it’s hard to setup and it’s not hot enough but I disagree. It was fairly self explanatory to setup as is the digital menu. The coffee is hot and you can adjust it up or down to suit your liking. You can also change the coffee strength and volumes to suit your taste and cup sizes. Water tank is a fair size, the front loading makes life easier too as this machine is on a worktop underneath wall units. The Cup warming plate is another good feature But you need to set the auto on timer if you want warm cups in the morning. I use the same Lavazza beans I use in my machine at my office (which was almost twice the price!) and I find the result even better with this DeLonghi!

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Love this machine it makes great coffee we have tried several different beans, it gives you 5 choices of strength which is really good as some beans are stronger than others.  It makes really good cappuccino I make a double and the froth is really good.  It also cleans the froth nozzle and coffee nozzles each time to keep everything clean and running smoothly.  The hot water is great and it is all very quick.  Like the fact that parts are stainless steel on this machine.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I bought this for £450 when it was on offer. Would not pay £800+ for any coffee machine unless I was very wealthy, but getting a £500 work bonus, decided to treat myself since I am stuck working from home.I had a manual espresso machine before, which was on its last legs, so decided to give bean to cup a try.  The pre-programmed options make weak coffee, however I could programme coffee strength, temperature and amount. Then the milk option is also programmable, so I can still easily make different coffees, but just need to press 3 or 4 buttons instead of 1 to get a full flavoured coffee. Comparing this to manually grinding coffee, trying to press it the right amount an manually steaming milk, pressing a few buttons is no effort at all. You need to spend a bit of time when you first get the machine to configure it to your taste, but oncd this is sorted, then boom...instant coffee! The flavour and texture is much better than I ever could make with a manual machine. I use starbucks dark roast espresso beans and would argue the coffee made is on par with, if not better than at a coffee shop.The other great thing is it has a timer to automatically switch on and warm the tray at the top. I set it to come on 1 hour before I have breakfast and put my cup on the tray the night before so it is warm for when I want my coffee. Some reviews state the coffee is not that hot. It is not boiling hot, but if you put the temperature setting on high and warm cups on the tray, then it is  a good temperature to drink.The self rinsing an reminders to descale etc ensure it stays in top condition. It even has a setting to brew coffee based on water hardness.Now I have this, I cant live without it. A must for any home!

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Our old delonghi bean to cup died after 4 and a half years of heavy use so it was time for an upgrade. This is superb perfect choice of bean strength a great selection of coffees and I no longer have to mess about failing at frothing my milk. One thing I didn’t realise is this brews a perfect cup of tea with the hot water tea tap so for my wife that was an absolute winner as the tap comes out at the core edge speed to brew a proper cuppa. All in all very happy and something that is defo worth the purchase in these strange times of working from home. Top work delinghi.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This machine is wonderful, makes a very tasty and creamy coffee, and a very frothy cappuccino. It is very easy to use and to clean. It's all you need to say bye bye to the expensive pods, saving the environment while saving money in the long run.It is also very easy to costumize, which allows you to set your own ratio of milk to coffee on your drinks, or set how large your "long coffee" is.For those who say the drink is not hot enough, follow the manual and increase temperature on the menu, it comes from factory set to 2/4. Don't warm up the milk as it makes it your drink less frothy and less tasty, and you won't be able to store it again on the fridge.As good as this machine is, if you feel it's still not quite like the coffee from your favourite coffee shop, there's a reason those machines cost 15 grand. Get real because this is a very good quality domestic machine and makes excellent coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I bought from amazon marketplace. Costing me four hundred and sixty six pounds The machine arrived broken, missing the milk carafe. This happened on the 24th of August. Initially I was happy to accept a refund to the amount that it would cost me to replace the carafe. When that was agreed we tried to operate the machine and discovered that it wasn't working at all at all. On further inspection discovered the water tank had a crack on it.I sent it back to amazon the same day. It is Still not registering as returned - so I will be waiting for my refund. I am disgusted with the treatment I have received. It is not good enough.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: We bought this to replace a faulty earlier model we had. We decided to upgrade a little and it was definitely worth paying a little bit extra.This machine is fantastic. Easy to use, easy to maintain and makes great coffee. We personally prefer extra strong taste and this machine delivers on all levels.It’s not the smallest machine on the planet but it looks great on the worktop and isn’t too noisy.The milk attachment is great too. You do need to use cold milk but we just fill it up and keep it in the fridge until the next time.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: What a fantastic machine!When it arrived my mother exclaimed, “what on earth is that!” After a lot of explaining and quite a bit of pulling and unwrapping the machine was in our kitchen. Much to my mother and father amazement it fit under the kitchen cabinets, the scepticism was part due to the sheer size of the box this beast comes in.A fantastic machine and so easy to set up and use! It seems daunting at first, however when you realise what you have to do it’s so simple and intuitive.Press “milk menu” and “ok” for a scrumptious Latte! Or simply press one of the pre programmed buttons and it whirs into action!I will warn you all now, at first this mammoth machine did make me jump out of my skin! When you first set it up there is air in the “professional quality pump” this pump tries to push the air out and suck in water. During this process the sound is the equivalent to a jack hammer at close range. However this is only during the initial set up! And after that you get used to the whirs and clicks it makes.All in all a fabulous machine that makes gorgeous coffee!

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This machine makes great coffee, milk is on the cool side, I really like this machine, BUT it keeps forgetting the custom settings I put in for cappuccino, it's great for a few days then it reverts back to factory setting which is basically half a cup of coffee. I have kept it switched on at the plug and with no power cuts etc it still forgets the programmed quantity which is very annoying!

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: So impressed with this machine, we’ve actually been through 2 other machines from other brands but returned them as the taste of the coffee was not what we wanted but this machine makes the most amazing coffee which is impossible not to like. Of course you have to play around with it but once you know how to use it properly it’s just faultless. I make cappuccinos, iced lattes, macchiato or just plane Americano and all taste great!Only thing is that if you used skimmed milk  coffee is not as nice as semi-skimmed or full fat but I guess skimmed milk tastes bad in everything!In summary it’s just a 5* machine.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I had a delinghi bean to cup machine and this died over christmas. So having looked, and based on price and recommendations, I went for this model.Unfortunately my experience so far had been grim!  The machine constantly complains about the coffe grinding being too fine or the water circuit is not right. Regarding the latter what even is that. I have till the end of the month to return it and I almost did!I shall give it another week.Oh and how comes all the servings are thimblefuls! Even the long coffee option.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Very pleased with our bean to cup coffee machine, we bought it as our Christmas present to each other!. It’s been lovely having nice coffee every morning. Especially as at the moment we can’t have coffee out.The grinder is a little noisy but don’t see how they’d make that quieter, makes a smaller cup than we are used to but I sometime just have 2 cups. You can adjust a lot of things, we haven’t got used to all of them as yet. For those who find the coffee is not hot enough, you can turn the setting up to high and I find it’s best to run some hot water into the cup to warm it before you begin.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: We have used Nespresso machines for a long time now, and felt that it was either time to upgrade to the latest Nespresso pod machine, or go full hog and get a bean to cup machine. The best Nespresso machines we ever had were Delonghi, hence why we went for this one, that and the fact that it was more or less half price. It is easy to use, creates an excellent coffee and can make Cappuccino's etc if that is your thing. All round brilliant, but it is somewhat bigger that the Nespresso equivalent.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: As someone that works in the coffee industry and many of the Bean to Cup machines that you see in chain coffee shops and stores, the quality of milk and coffee that this machine produces is on par with any of those.Setup is a little complicated (mainly due to the instructions), but after that the machine is a breeze. I've calibrated my own versions of the programs (as I like a stronger coffee), and from startup to finished latte or flat white, it's about 90 seconds. My only con is the size of the milk container, it's about 3 drinks.Fantastic product.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: What can I say it's fabulous.Crème coffee. Packing flavour.Down side is needs oiling every week.And the metal plate is very easy scratched.I use food grade silicon.It makes a wheezing sound when making coffee. I open her up and oil her main spring. This afords me 1 week until I have to do her again!

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Had this machine for a while now.Takes for ever to get the grind right. The coffee still comes out weak. If you dial the grind just another hair finer, it just won't pour, and the display says the grinds are too fine. It just doesn't have the right specs to do the job.I've tried different coffee roasts, different blends, it's not enough. I've spent enough on this machine where I can't just get rid of it.I'll have to go to another brand next time.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This is a great machine when new but dont expect it to last more than a year.  Second machine made by this company has now failed, only just outside warranty.  These are expensive pieces of kit and should last many years.  Ours was cleaned and descaled as per manufacturer's recommendation.Avoid avoid avoid. Buy a different brand.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This is something else, is like having your very own Barista at your finger tips, all you have to do is to point (well, touch). I know that is down to the quality of coffee used, but from grinding, creama, flavour, frothing and temperature etc all you can adjust and personalise. Very easy to use and Guess what? It clean itself!!!!!!! I love it

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This is my first bean to cup machine. I wanted to change from my Nespresso machine and after some research decided on this one. Easy to use once you have read the instructions, have not tried to set up the personal cup size and strength etc.The chrome metal plate that the cup sits on does scratch easily but now I always leave a piece of kitchen towel for the cup to sit on.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Bought the machine on BFriday at a fantastic price. Haven't had a chance set it up as we are refurbishing the kitchen. Unpacked it to check contents, it is big as others have mentioned but I suppose an AIO machine would be. If you can wait the price goes up and down like a yo-yo and you can grab yourself a real bargain. camelcamelcamel is a price tracking site I used. 5 * rating based on price and build quality.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I love this machine!  First venture into the Bean2Cup machines and wish I had done it earlier.  Its just so easy to make great coffee everytime.  Only feature I would like is to plumb it into a water supply, but git into routine of filling up water, empty tray and grounds at night to avoid the morning stress.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Very simple to useI didn't configure and mycoffee settings.I just use 2 cup extra strong and all good.Touch screen is easy.  Like any gadget these days just spend 20 mins reading manual and it's dead easy to use.Have been using for a few months and so far no issues.  I'd definitely buy this model again.I havent cleaned yet but in general parts are easy to pull apart such as drip tray and ground catcher.  Touch panel stays clean.  We leave a cup under the nozzles so when it does the on and off rinse cycles, we dont fill the drip tray.Coffee tastes great.  We only drink black and coffee hasn't been bitter or tasteless.  The choice of Beans obviously help with this equation but I just bought beans off Amazon based on reviews of others.Simple and saves using plastic pods or buying plastic coffee cups.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: What a fantastic brown water coming out from this thing! Send it back for repair and and all they’ve done was to clean it!!! Send it back again, let’s wait and see are they gonna clean it again and send it back to me! What a waist of money and time. My 10 years old coffee machine make much better coffee. So, if you want a good coffee, look  elsewhere as bean to cup coffee makers are fancy but useless.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: We have used De Longhi bean to cup machines for some years now, and recently upgraded to this.  It is a revelation.  Full automatic and myriad choices strength and depth. Review Description: A justified purchase, well just. I got this at half price on deal of the day and even so spending over £400 on a coffee machine seems quite ridiculous. However I managed to justify it to myself and I have not been disappointed. The coffee is truly excellent, it’s incredibly easy to use and its very fun to be able to choose an option and just press a button to get a great tasting coffee.It is a bit of a monster and takes up a fair amount of space so be warned if you have a small kitchen. The styling won’t be to everyone’s taste but it’s definitely not ugly and it’s going to be a talking point when anyone comes into the kitchen. Your guests will also be sure to ask for a coffee! I’ve drunk more coffee today (it got delivered this afternoon) than I normally drink in a week but I guarantee if you buy it you will do the same as you will want to try everything it makes. This is probably the reason why I feel wide awake at 11:35pm!Quality wise, it feels good. Lots of plastic but doesn’t look or feel cheap. It’s easy to navigate through the menu and coffee options and you can customise just about every drink from strength to size and type and quantity of milk.  I have read reviews saying that the coffee is not hot enough for them.  Unless you enjoy the sensation of blistering your mouth then this machines coffee is plenty warm enough. It is worthwhile preheating your cups with hot water (rinse function) first to keep your coffee hotter though.It is a very automated machine, and if you fancy yourself as a bit of a home barista then look elsewhere. If your not bothered by trying to look like you know what you are doing with compacting and milk frothing and want a machine to do it almost perfectly then you will be hard pressed to find better. I have only had this for one day, so it is quite premature to write a review. However as sad as it sounds I’m already looking forward to firing it up tomorrow morning and so I felt the need to write about it.In conclusion, yes it’s very expensive but it makes a whole lotta great coffee.

I will try to post a photo soon. Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: *Update: frothed milk alone only comes out warm, not hot so not ideal for making frothy HOT chocolate unless you're happy to microwave it afterwards. My latest pics show froth at around 50oC. This goes up to a more acceptable 70-ish oC when the coffee is added.*I also own the Magnifica machine which is at the other end DeLonghi's bean-to-cup range.Looks-wise, if the Magnifica is a Cyber-Man then this Eletta is definitely Darth Vader.The Eletta is a fraction slimmer but sticks out more at the front.It can take much taller mugs for both coffee and foam at 14.5 cm vs. 11cm for the Magnifica.The housings are both in plastic but the Eletta has a stainless steel drip tray vs the Magnifica's plastic one.The bean hopper is at the back on the Eletta which is less ergonomic imo as it's harder to fill/monitor.I've upped a couple of photo's, I hope you find them useful.The main differences are that the Eletta is more computerised with an LED display and has its own milk-frother system.The frothing system works very well; it delivers a consistent, lasting, tight foam from a cold milk reservoir which can be kept in the fridge between uses. However, a skilled barista would likely get a better foam with a traditional system, and the foam on the Eletta only comes out warm, not hot. The machine rinses the frother after use and the only cleaning required is to wipe the nozzle where the frother attaches to the machine. I've included close-up pics of the nozzle.The Eletta will make a long coffee made-up of 2 separate doses of coffee, grinding and reloading half way through. This comes out far too strong for me but may suit others.I did notice that this Eletta can grind finer than the Magnifica I have, not that I need it that fine (only produces drips of coffee).Not sure if this is consistent machine-to machine of the same model but it is apparent with the ones I have.Neither machine allows you to grind and store the ground coffee, which is a shame. -I'd like a divert flap to allow you to collect your favourite blend for holidays/friends/relatives.Whether the Eletta machine is for you/worth the extra depends on how important these features are.My first impressions are that you're paying for and getting an effective and convenient frothing system plus some programmability. I'm still working my way through the manual as there is quite a lot to learn and several customisable options. Water temp is adjustable by 4 pre-set levels, the default being 2 (halfway). I know HOT coffee is important to some.I use double-walled glass mugs which make temperature less critical as they don't cool the contents half as much.One menu option, 'Statistics' includes data on descaling and water filter replacement. I would be suspicious that DeLonghi might use this to invalidate any guarantee. I only say this as when my Magnifica packed-up within weeks of receipt, Delonghi's first response was for assurance that I had descaled it and used it in accordance with the instructions. I elected to instead use Amazon's own return service and received a replacement before even returning the dud unit. -No questons asked.I shall not be replacing the (supplied) water filter every 2 months at £8- a pop as advised. But I will be descaling regularly as one should with any coffee machine. Delonghi really would be being churlish if they didn't honour a guarantee due to irregular filter use alone.My Magnifica makes just as good a coffee (as far as I can tell) but I rarely froth milk with it -partly because I'm no good at it.This Eletta really does seem to provide a quality cappuccino.. without the need for a professional!But despite the minimal cleaning required, I must admit I still only use the frother at weekends.

Review Description: Having owned a de'Longhi Magnifica automatic cappuccino machine for 7 years I find this new machine to be an excellent replacement.  We well and truly ran the Magnifica into the ground and it unfortunately got to the point where all parts were obsolete so it was no longer possible to fix. Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Having had this machine for a few weeks, I could not be more happy with it. It arrived with a water filter and one packet of Descaler, although it's not advertised as coming with these. I also joined the delonghi coffee club and they sent me another two packets of Descaler for free and also the option to have a free service of the machine after a year. I have been trying different beans and I've yet to have a bad coffee from this machine, although some beans are better than others so you'll just have to experiment with your own taste. I like Americano coffee and if you put a mug under the coffees dispenser and set it for extra long coffee and press two cups it fills the mug to the perfect level and the resulting cup is as good a coffee as you will get anywhere. The milk carafe makes perfect cappuccino's, latte's and flat white's, although I'm not into these myself. Filling the water tank is easy, emptying the grounds container is easy and filling the beans hopper is easy. In fact if I had to sum this machine up in one word, it's "easy". Just press the button and it makes a perfect cup every time, easier than boiling a kettle, in fact our kettle is only used for making gravy now, but I could even let the machine do that with the hot water dispenser if I wished. My wife loves the machine too and she would never use our old machine because it was too much faffing about and now I can't keep her away from this machine. If you purchase this machine you will not be disappointed, your coffee intake will increase so be prepared for that because you will just love the results. The start to finish times for making a drink is better than the kettle, and so much more convenient. I shall only ever have a bean to cup machine from now on, the delonghi cappuccino is the best kitchen appliance I now own and all I can say is I love it. Five stars.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I've had this machine a month now and I'm just getting to grips with its operation, it is quite a complex device but arguably with good cause. My whole family love the coffee this machine produces - we have a variety of tastes from very strong short black coffee to very mild, frothy capuccino and this machine does them all to perfection.Practically every aspect of your coffees' creation is adjustable from obvious things like strength and amount, through milk frothiness (micro-foam for flat whites to full froth for capuccini) and bean grinding grade, to temperature.An important aspect of any coffee machine is the ease of cleaning, especially if it involves milk, and again this machine is excellent; not only does it go through a rinse (and warming) cycle when you switch it on, it also purges itself when it's switched off. Coffee grinds are dumped, as a nice disc, into the coffee grind bin, the infuser is easily removed and rinsed and the milk steamer/frother has its own cleaning cycle and the whole is easy to dismantle and wash.I've mentioned that it's complex, there's a lot of functionality to get to grips with: from grinding grade, to various milk and coffee options, to length and temperature and a lot of this is programmable so that you can get your coffees exactly the way you want them.There's not much to fault about this machine, it's quite large, and eye-wateringly expensive, but if you can justify the price then it's a worthy purchase.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This unit is not that big considering the Bean-to-cup system comprises of a coffee bean storage tray, grinder, tampering unit, kettle, water tank, waste water tray, waster granuals tray and residual coffee tray.Prior to any drink made the system will do a quick flush though to clean the pipes and then get underway to make you a drink of choice. Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Treated ourselves to this model  this to replace our old De Longhi Magnicifca coffee machine, which had been a fantastic workhorse for 7 years.Got a great deal on this  model so decided to splash out on the version that does all the work for you. Not always a fan of cappuccinos as they can be weak and lack flavour, and I used to prefer an unadulterated strong coffee from my old machine but am absolutely hooked on the cappuccinos from this one. I guess the internals get saturated by the coffee aroma, therefore the coffee taste gets more intense and delicious.My favourite coffee beans at the moment are Lavazza Espresso Super CremaAll the milk coffees are excellent too, you might need to prewarm the cup, I find it lukewarm otherwise.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: We bought this to replace our previous De'Longhi machine, which we had for ten years and used almost every day.  It was of an earlier technology, however, and when it mal-functioned we decided that repair was too uncertain and expensive to justify.  So we bought this model, which seemed the closest fit for the types of coffee we like to drink.  We are very, very happy with this new Eletta model.  It is attractively designed, but of course its most important features are the improvements in coffee-making.  Compared to our earlier De'Longhi - with which we were well satisfied - this new machine produces coffee that is significantly hotter, so we can drink it from ordinary cups and it stays hot long enough to savour and enjoy at leisure. Another improvement is the system for milk steaming: this works a treat with the Soya Milk that we use and produces a great steamed froth in a cappuccino that is notably hotter than we get in almost any coffee shop as well as hotter than in our old machine.  The enlarged water reservoir and bean storage are also welcome.  We've been using it for almost a month now and we still get a positive thrill from using it.  Worth every penny, at least for those who enjoy good coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Absolutely amazing, very easy to use, produce very nice black coffee and perfect cappuccino.The machine itself is quite large but looks great and will complement every kitchen. The ability to chose the size, strength and temperature of your coffee means you can tailor it to your own personal preference very easily.It is quite expensive but worth every penny. I'm very pleased with it.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: This machine is great especially when you save a few hundred quid in the sale!I did find the enclosed instructions a bit hit and miss especially when you want to program the size of drinks. The YouTube videos are a big help here.I didn't fit the water filter as I filter all our water already. You get through a tankful pretty quickly so leaving out the filter gives a bit more capacity. Also, on first use you will probably need to manipulate the beans down the hole. The bean holder takes a 250g bag (we ordered 4 packs as a bundle on Amazon and keep them in freezer until used).I found the Lavazza Rossa coffee bean is very good and makes a lovely coffee with a very good crema. The milk drinks are very nice but you don't get the heat that you will with a straight black coffee. I heat cups with hot water when machine rinses after being turned on. The milk frother works very well and the clean function on the milk container is a good idea.This will be considerably cheaper, in the long term, than the Dolce Gusto pod machine it replaces. So nice to have a quality coffee every morning. It tastes better than many of the high street coffees in my opinion.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: Had it for a few days now and like it. Had intended to get the cheaper DeLonghi but thought what the heck, certainly not cheap but bean to cup machines aren't. It's straight forward to get started although the manual perhaps makes it seem more complicated than it is and could be better. Everything's customisable, strength, temperature, amount produced... but if you're used to having a full mug/cappuccino cup (300ml'ish) then by default even the extra long doesn't fill it as it uses standard servings (I think) so an extra long espresso is 120ml.Some aren't happy with the cappuccino/milk temperature. I've been warming the cups using the kettle so they're nice and toasty and using milk straight from the fridge. It seems hot enough to me as long as you're intending to drink it straight away. Not tried nuking the milk so it's luke warm yet to see what that's like.Only slight minus so far is, unless I've missed something, getting the last beans out of the hopper when you want to change blends or swap between decaf is a bit of a pain. Been trying various Rave coffees. Might be a common thing and assume it's to so fingers aren't ground too.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: I've been making my own coffee for eight years with; a cheap Delonghi espresso machine (still going strong), decently priced Dualit grinder (had Delonghi before but it broke quite quickly) and a cheap milk frother (same as the VAVA one on here), all in all about a 3rd of the price of this.Started off with the setting of 7 on the grinder, which is how it comes, double shots and done a couple of pulls with it set extra strong and watery crap came out. Set it to 1 and nothing, went up in increments until finally after lots of wasted coffee beans it went through at 3.5. Why might you ask the setting of one is there, go figure. Sadly it was still crap. Automatic machines cannot make decent coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, double boiler, milk frothermaker for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato & Flat white. ECAM44660B Eletta
Review Description: ... i had a siemens machine that after 12 yrs retired gracefully. I opted for the make your own, capsules etc and then realised it was costing me a small fortune so back to bean to cup. So far so good - great looking machine, still getting used to it in terms of pressing the right buttons to get the drink i want -> this is user operation error by the way, need to reduce the amount of milk it dispenses, more coffee etc but i will get used to it. I like the idea of being able to put the milk container in the fridge, thats really handy on many levels. All good so far!I looked at multiple machines it was between this and the Jura but i could not figure out why the price difference - perhaps time will tell? this does more for the money and equally other ratings seem to support this.Enjoy! will report back if anything changes because this is an expensive purchase and should last for many many coffees to come.
